recipe.title: Corpse Reviver 3000
ingredients: 3/4 ounce Tenneyson Absinthe Royale or other blanche absinthe
3/4 ounce orange liqueuer (we used Paula's Texas Orange; Cointreau also works well)
instructions: Combine the absinthe, St-Germain, orange liqueur, and lemon juice in a mixing glass and shake vigorously with ice to chill. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with the orange "coin."
